creditline: Lent by DRG, DRG Collection and Darwin and Geri Reedy
department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: male figure with nails and flat metal objects pounded into the torso; a chain hangs from the nails, in front of legs; band of red pigment across forehead; tanned hide strips hang from nails on back; circular wooden base
dimension: H.18 x W.12 x D.10 in. (approx.)
medium: wood, nails, pigment, metal, tanned hide, raffia, muslin
title: Nkisi Nkonde
